alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 6:46AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ulster and central Dutchess Counties through 715 AM EDT... At 646 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Modena, or near New Paltz, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, New Paltz, Wallkill, Hyde Park, Plattekill, Pleasant Valley, Wappingers Falls, Highland, Millbrook, Modena, Fairview, Marlboro, Red Oaks Mill, Stanfordville, Lloyd, Esopus, Gardiner, Tuckers Corner, Salt Point and Forest Glen. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess
